name: Config 2022 Building a Design System using Figma & Sanity Headless CMS to Document It
description: Over the last 6 months PUMA Global eCommerce and their design + dev partners at Formidable have been creating PUMA's first Unified Design System. Join to learn how they use Figma for their design library and the headless content management system Sanity to house their component library + documentation.
